Quote.Author: Francis Parker Yockey
Quote.QuoteValue: The 19th century was the age of Individualism; the 20th and 21st are the ages of Socialism

Quote.Author: Francis Picabia
Quote.QuoteValue: Good taste is as tiring as good company

Quote.Author: Francis Picabia
Quote.QuoteValue: A new gadget that lasts only five minutes is worth more than an immortal work that bores everyone

Quote.Author: Francis Picabia
Quote.QuoteValue: Between my head and my hand, there is always the face of death

Quote.Author: Francis Picabia
Quote.QuoteValue: Pain has its reasons, pleasure is totally indifferent

Quote.Author: Francis Picabia
Quote.QuoteValue: My ass contemplates those who talk behind my back

Quote.Author: Francis Picabia
Quote.QuoteValue: God invented concubinage, satan marriage

Quote.Author: Francis Picabia
Quote.QuoteValue: A free spirit takes liberties even with liberty itself

Quote.Author: Francis Picabia
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to have clean ideas, change them as often as your shirt

Quote.Author: Francis Picabia
Quote.QuoteValue: My arse contemplates those who talk behind my back

Quote.Author: Francis Picabia
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us never forget that the greatest man is never more than an animal disguised as a god

Quote.Author: Francis Quarles
Quote.QuoteValue: Flatter not thyself in thy faith in God if thou hast not charity for thy neighbor

Quote.Author: Francis Quarles
Quote.QuoteValue: And he repents in thorns that sleeps in beds of roses

Quote.Author: Francis Quarles
Quote.QuoteValue: The sufficiency of merit is to know that my merit is not sufficient

Quote.Author: Francis Quarles
Quote.QuoteValue: He that hath no cross deserves no crown

Quote.Author: Francis Quarles
Quote.QuoteValue: My mind's my kingdom

Quote.Author: Francis Quarles
Quote.QuoteValue: The road to perseverance lies by doubt

Quote.Author: Francis Quarles
Quote.QuoteValue: Wickedness is its own punishment

Quote.Author: Francis Quarles
Quote.QuoteValue: Has fortune dealt you some bad cards. Then let wisdom make you a good gamester

Quote.Author: Francis Quarles
Quote.QuoteValue: That friendship will not continue to the end which is begun for an end

Quote.Author: Francis Quarles
Quote.QuoteValue: The average person's ear weighs what you are, not what you were

Quote.Author: Francisco Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents had a factory, so I was linked to the textile and fashion industry

Quote.Author: Francisco Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no tolerance for boredom. I spend so many hours in the office, and I still love it

Quote.Author: Francisco Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: I cannot live without art: it excites me, it challenges me, and it leads me to the next thing

Quote.Author: Francisco Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not an artist. I'm a fashion designer of clothes

Quote.Author: Francisco Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: I do go back to Brazil once a year. I miss my family

Quote.Author: Francisco Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't love reading so much, but I love book shopping

Quote.Author: Francisco Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to be involved with fashion, though I didn't know what being a designer meant

Quote.Author: Francisco Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: I never liked sleeping; I always think I am missing something

Quote.Author: Francisco Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: I drape a lot. I cut. I have to touch. For me, it's almost impossible to start without that

Quote.Author: Francisco Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: My love of fashion stemmed from my mother's passion for it

Quote.Author: Francois Hollande
Quote.QuoteValue: We have chased away the clouds, the sky is all 'rose.'

Quote.Author: Francois Hollande
Quote.QuoteValue: I ask to be judged on the issue of unemployment

Quote.Author: Francois Hollande
Quote.QuoteValue: Long live the Republic, and long live France

Quote.Author: Francois Hollande
Quote.QuoteValue: I am attached to the French language. I will defend the ubiquitous use of French

Quote.Author: Francois Hollande
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to initiate a change in society in the long term

Quote.Author: Francois Hollande
Quote.QuoteValue: I am proud to have been capable of giving people hope again

Quote.Author: Francois Hollande
Quote.QuoteValue: Each country has a soul, and France's soul is equality

Quote.Author: Francois Hollande
Quote.QuoteValue: My adversary is the world of finance

Quote.Author: Francois Hollande
Quote.QuoteValue: In an election, one needs both hope and audacity

Quote.Author: Francois Hollande
Quote.QuoteValue: Sport allows people to come together, but politics divides people

Quote.Author: Francois Nars
Quote.QuoteValue: Makeup is about balance. When the eye makes a statement, the lips should be quiet

Quote.Author: Francois Nars
Quote.QuoteValue: Find your own way, have an open spirit, and believe in your own beauty

Quote.Author: Francois Nars
Quote.QuoteValue: True icons are larger than life, unforgettable with an elegance that's mesmerizingly timeless

Quote.Author: Francois Nars
Quote.QuoteValue: I like beauty to be a bit edgy, not typical. For me, the only rule is looking good

Quote.Author: Francois Nars
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very nostalgic - and I don't care

Quote.Author: Francois Nars
Quote.QuoteValue: We love those under-eye circles. It's real life

Quote.Author: Francois Nars
Quote.QuoteValue: Makeup can make a woman look more beautiful at every age

Quote.Author: Francois Nars
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to be a make up artist. I did it, and the road that I took was quite good

Quote.Author: Francois Nars
Quote.QuoteValue: Transparency is more sexy than a full, pancake finish

Quote.Author: Francois Nars
Quote.QuoteValue: In this world, you do your job, a good job, and that's what counts

Quote.Author: Francois Rabelais
Quote.QuoteValue: To good and true love fear is forever affixed

Quote.Author: Francois Rabelais
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything comes in time to those who can wait

Quote.Author: Francois Rabelais
Quote.QuoteValue: I have known many who could not when they would, for they had not done it when they could

Quote.Author: Francois Rabelais
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature abhors a vacuum

Quote.Author: Francois Rabelais
Quote.QuoteValue: When I drink, I think; and when I think, I drink

Quote.Author: Francois Rabelais
Quote.QuoteValue: The farce is finished. I go to seek a vast perhaps

Quote.Author: Francois Rabelais
Quote.QuoteValue: No clock is more regular than the belly

Quote.Author: Francois Rabelais
Quote.QuoteValue: If you wish to avoid seeing a fool you must first break your looking glass

Quote.Author: Francois Rabelais
Quote.QuoteValue: A bellyful is a bellyful

Quote.Author: Francois Rabelais
Quote.QuoteValue: If the skies fall, one may hope to catch larks

Quote.Author: Francois Truffaut
Quote.QuoteValue: Film lovers are sick people

Quote.Author: Francois Truffaut
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always preferred the reflection of the life to life itself

Quote.Author: Francois Truffaut
Quote.QuoteValue: Hitchcock loves to be misunderstood, because he has based his whole life around misunderstandings

Quote.Author: Francois Truffaut
Quote.QuoteValue: The film of tomorrow will be an act of love

Quote.Author: Francois Truffaut
Quote.QuoteValue: Taste is a result of a thousand distastes

Quote.Author: Francois Truffaut
Quote.QuoteValue: Is the cinema more important than life?

Quote.Author: Francois Truffaut
Quote.QuoteValue: In love, women are professionals, men are amateurs

Quote.Author: Francois Truffaut
Quote.QuoteValue: Some day I'll make a film that critics will like. When I have money to waste

Quote.Author: Francois Truffaut
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always preferred the reflect of the life to life itself

Quote.Author: Francois Truffaut
Quote.QuoteValue: I had thought of writing, actually, and that later on I'd be a novelist

Quote.Author: Francoise Sagan
Quote.QuoteValue: To jealousy, nothing is more frightful than laughter

Quote.Author: Francoise Sagan
Quote.QuoteValue: It would be bad form for me to describe people I don't know and don't understand

Quote.Author: Francoise Sagan
Quote.QuoteValue: A dress makes no sense unless it inspires men to take it off of you

Quote.Author: Francoise Sagan
Quote.QuoteValue: Art must take reality by surprise

Quote.Author: Francoise Sagan
Quote.QuoteValue: One can never speak enough of the virtues, the dangers, the power of shared laughter

Quote.Author: Francoise Sagan
Quote.QuoteValue: Every little girl knows about love. It is only her capacity to suffer because of it that increases

Quote.Author: Francoise Sagan
Quote.QuoteValue: Jazz music is an intensified feeling of nonchalance

Quote.Author: Francoise Sagan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've read Proust and Stendhal. That keeps you in your place

Quote.Author: Francoise Sagan
Quote.QuoteValue: I always believe things are going to work out

Quote.Author: Francoise Sagan
Quote.QuoteValue: The one thing I regret is that I will never have time to read all the books I want to read

Quote.Author: Frank A. Clark
Quote.QuoteValue: A father is a man who expects his son to be as good a man as he meant to be

Quote.Author: Frank A. Clark
Quote.QuoteValue: Most smiles are started by another smile

Quote.Author: Frank A. Clark
Quote.QuoteValue: A baby is born with a need to be loved - and never outgrows it

Quote.Author: Frank A. Clark
Quote.QuoteValue: If you find a path with no obstacles, it probably doesn't lead anywhere

Quote.Author: Frank A. Clark
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important thing that parents can teach their children is how to get along without them

Quote.Author: Frank A. Clark
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone is trying to accomplish something big, not realizing that life is made up of little things

Quote.Author: Frank A. Clark
Quote.QuoteValue: Real generosity is doing something nice for someone who will never find out

Quote.Author: Frank A. Clark
Quote.QuoteValue: Modern man is frantically trying to earn enough to buy things he's too busy to enjoy

Quote.Author: Frank A. Clark
Quote.QuoteValue: Why not upset the apple cart? If you don't, the apples will rot anyway

Quote.Author: Frank A. Clark
Quote.QuoteValue: Gossip needn't be false to be evil - there's a lot of truth that shouldn't be passed around

Quote.Author: Frank Abagnale
Quote.QuoteValue: Why do the Yankees always win? The other team can't stop looking at the pinstripes

Quote.Author: Frank Abagnale
Quote.QuoteValue: The front of a cheque alone gives someone enough information to steal your identity

Quote.Author: Frank Abagnale
Quote.QuoteValue: If my forgeries looked as bad as the CBS documents, it would have been 'Catch Me In Two Days'

Quote.Author: Frank Abagnale
Quote.QuoteValue: What I did in my youth is hundreds of times easier today. Technology breeds crime

Quote.Author: Frank Abagnale
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no technology today that cannot be defeated by social engineering

Quote.Author: Frank Abagnale
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to think a little smarter, be proactive, not reactive

Quote.Author: Frank Abagnale
Quote.QuoteValue: People say that life is short, but it isn't short. It's very long

Quote.Author: Frank Abagnale
Quote.QuoteValue: I use a credit card for everything - and I choose one of the ones which gives you money back

Quote.Author: Frank Abagnale
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth is, your identity already has been stolen

Quote.Author: Frank Abagnale
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people don't reconcile their bank accounts

Quote.Author: Frank Bruno
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're a man you try and be macho

Quote.Author: Frank Bruno
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes your dreams come true

Quote.Author: Frank Bruno
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes when you have bipolar you have days you are grumpy and not feeling yourself

Quote.Author: Frank Bruno
Quote.QuoteValue: Boxing is the toughest and loneliest sport in the world

Quote.Author: Frank Bruno
Quote.QuoteValue: I ain't got no right to judge someone

Quote.Author: Frank Bruno
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not really a cutter-off sort of person. I'll chat to anybody

Quote.Author: Frank Bruno
Quote.QuoteValue: I try and maintain a little bit of fitness, man

Quote.Author: Frank Bruno
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people like going to the pub; I enjoy going to the gym

Quote.Author: Frank Bruno
Quote.QuoteValue: My head has got regrets, but I haven't

Quote.Author: Frank Bruno
Quote.QuoteValue: I still believe in marriage

Quote.Author: Frank Gehry
Quote.QuoteValue: Architecture should speak of its time and place, but yearn for timelessness

Quote.Author: Frank Gehry
Quote.QuoteValue: If I knew where I was going, I wouldn't do it. When I can predict or plan it, I don't do it

Quote.Author: Frank Gehry
Quote.QuoteValue: I work from the inside out

Quote.Author: Frank Gehry
Quote.QuoteValue: My buildings are all on budget

Quote.Author: Frank Gehry
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my greatest influences is the Italian artist Gian Lorenzo Bernini

Quote.Author: Frank Gehry
Quote.QuoteValue: The best advice I've received is to be yourself. The best artists do that

Quote.Author: Frank Gehry
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to bumble forward into the unknown

Quote.Author: Frank Gehry
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a backlash against me and everyone who has done buildings that have movement and feeling

Quote.Author: Frank Gehry
Quote.QuoteValue: There is stuff I would have liked to have done. But there are no sour grapes

Quote.Author: Frank Gehry
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't just decide myself what's being built. Someone decides what they want, then I work for them

Quote.Author: Frank Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Seek freedom and become captive of your desires. Seek discipline and find your liberty

Quote.Author: Frank Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Without change, something sleeps inside us, and seldom awakens. The sleeper must awaken

Quote.Author: Frank Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Respect for the truth comes close to being the basis for all morality

Quote.Author: Frank Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Wealth is a tool of freedom, but the pursuit of wealth is the way to slavery

Quote.Author: Frank Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: How often it is that the angry man rages denial of what his inner self is telling him

Quote.Author: Frank Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Enemies make you stronger, allies make you weaker

Quote.Author: Frank Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Kindness is the beginning of cruelty

Quote.Author: Frank Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Something cannot emerge from nothing

Quote.Author: Frank Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: The proximity of a desirable thing tempts one to overindulgence. On that path lies danger

Quote.Author: Frank Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: The beginning of knowledge is the discovery of something we do not understand

Quote.Author: Frank Lampard
Quote.QuoteValue: You remember the finals you lose as much as the ones you win

Quote.Author: Frank Lampard
Quote.QuoteValue: Barcelona are my favourite team in Spain, let's put it that way

Quote.Author: Frank Lampard
Quote.QuoteValue: I think as far as kids go, you just have to work hard. Work on your skills, keep focused

Quote.Author: Frank Lampard
Quote.QuoteValue: Goals never come easy. No one gives you goals

Quote.Author: Frank Lampard
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone's got unfinished business with Barcelona. They're the greatest team in the world

Quote.Author: Frank Lampard
Quote.QuoteValue: If I lose the ball, I lose it trying to do the right thing. That's the way it is

Quote.Author: Frank Lampard
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be a passenger sitting on the bench not doing much, even in my older years

Quote.Author: Frank Lampard
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody expects a footballer to have any kind of an IQ, which is a bit of an unfair stereotype

Quote.Author: Frank Lampard
Quote.QuoteValue: Being faster would probably make me better at football

Quote.Author: Frank Lampard
Quote.QuoteValue: I come from a football family which has really helped

Quote.Author: Frank Langella
Quote.QuoteValue: Then, for a hot three or four weeks I wanted to be a concert pianist

Quote.Author: Frank Langella
Quote.QuoteValue: We do most of what we do out of our sexual energy and our sexual needs

Quote.Author: Frank Langella
Quote.QuoteValue: The last few years have been pretty hectic

Quote.Author: Frank Langella
Quote.QuoteValue: The best kind of kinky sex is to have kinky sex with your wife or husband, the person you love

Quote.Author: Frank Langella
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a firm believer in absolute honesty

Quote.Author: Frank Langella
Quote.QuoteValue: Intelligence is enormously sexy

Quote.Author: Frank Langella
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in a household where everybody lived at the top of his lungs

Quote.Author: Frank Langella
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the safest places to be in the world is the stage

Quote.Author: Frank Langella
Quote.QuoteValue: And the test for any actor is whether you stay at the table or go away

Quote.Author: Frank Langella
Quote.QuoteValue: Each of us needs something - food, liquor, pot, whatever - to help us survive. Dracula needs blood

Quote.Author: Frank McCourt
Quote.QuoteValue: The sky is the limit. You never have the same experience twice

Quote.Author: Frank McCourt
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is hard to recall. Its just a glow

Quote.Author: Frank McCourt
Quote.QuoteValue: The main thing I am interested in is my experience as a teacher

Quote.Author: Frank McCourt
Quote.QuoteValue: We never really had any kind of a Christmas. This is one part where my memory fails me completely

Quote.Author: Frank McCourt
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't go too much into my domestic life because there are ex-wives ready to do me in

Quote.Author: Frank McCourt
Quote.QuoteValue: St. Patrick, bringing the religion to Ireland, this is what we should celebrate

Quote.Author: Frank McCourt
Quote.QuoteValue: You feel a sense of urgency, especially at my advanced age, when you're staring into the grave

Quote.Author: Frank McCourt
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been writing in notebooks for 40 years or so

Quote.Author: Frank McCourt
Quote.QuoteValue: There's so much absurdity. Poverty is so absurd

Quote.Author: Frank McCourt
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more interested in writing than in performing

Quote.Author: Frank Ocean
Quote.QuoteValue: As a lifestyle you always being the focal point is innately unhealthy

Quote.Author: Frank Ocean
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't fear anybody... at all

Quote.Author: Frank Ocean
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a centerfold

Quote.Author: Frank Ocean
Quote.QuoteValue: It's cool to be recognised by your peers

Quote.Author: Frank Ocean
Quote.QuoteValue: You just do what you can and you have as much fun as possible

Quote.Author: Frank Ocean
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy singing my songs in front of people

Quote.Author: Frank Ocean
Quote.QuoteValue: I play piano every day. I enjoy that

Quote.Author: Frank Ocean
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the anonymity that directors can have about their films

Quote.Author: Frank Ocean
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have any secrets I need kept any more

Quote.Author: Frank Ocean
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy being involved in making the artwork for albums and stupid stuff like that

Quote.Author: Frank Peretti
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't watch television

Quote.Author: Frank Peretti
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just a slow writer. I'm picky and careful and fastidious

Quote.Author: Frank Peretti
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know what idea is going to hit me when

Quote.Author: Frank Peretti
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to move a little more toward literary fiction while still retaining a popular feel

Quote.Author: Frank Peretti
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are writing for the Christian culture, there is a whole gamut of expectations

Quote.Author: Frank Peretti
Quote.QuoteValue: I always want to be on the cutting edge

Quote.Author: Frank Peretti
Quote.QuoteValue: Kids are not going to sit and read a slow-paced book. Neither are adults

Quote.Author: Frank Peretti
Quote.QuoteValue: The Gospel can stand up to scrutiny

Quote.Author: Frank Peretti
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a kid, I really got into monsters

Quote.Author: Frank Peretti
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very methodical writer. Before computers, I used reams of paper and stacks of index cards

Quote.Author: Frank Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Close don't count in baseball. Close only counts in horseshoes and grenades

Quote.Author: Frank Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I just didn't have anything to say, so I said nothing

Quote.Author: Frank Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: All in all, I wouldn't call it a bad outing. It was a short outing

Quote.Author: Frank Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I know a lot of people on the field - players, coaches, managers - are glad that I'm gone

Quote.Author: Frank Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Managers don't have as much leverage as they used to have. We can't really be the boss

Quote.Author: Frank Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: If he can hit, he can hit. I don't care if he came from Class Z league

Quote.Author: Frank Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: But I'm not going to walk Barry Bonds, like some teams do, in the first inning with nobody on

Quote.Author: Frank Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to have a short memory as a closer

Quote.Author: Frank Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I always tried to do the best. I knew I couldn't always be the best, but I tried to be

Quote.Author: Frank Robinson
Quote.QuoteValue: At least when it's in French, I won't know what the heck they're saying

Quote.Author: Frank Shorter
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't run 26 miles at five minutes a mile on good looks and a secret recipe

Quote.Author: Frank Shorter
Quote.QuoteValue: Because running fast is more fun than running slow

Quote.Author: Frank Shorter
Quote.QuoteValue: To put it another way, Michael Jordan was a gym rat

Quote.Author: Frank Shorter
Quote.QuoteValue: Hills are speedwork in disguise

Quote.Author: Frank Shorter
Quote.QuoteValue: Again, racing for me was about energy management

Quote.Author: Frank Shorter
Quote.QuoteValue: I admire runners older than I - they are now my heroes. I want to be like them as I grow older

Quote.Author: Frank Shorter
Quote.QuoteValue: I also held several masters running titles

Quote.Author: Frank Shorter
Quote.QuoteValue: I plan to be running as long as I can and have no plans to stop

Quote.Author: Frank Shorter
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the secret of my light, quick, foot strike is related to the fact that I have fragile feet

Quote.Author: Frank Shorter
Quote.QuoteValue: I was actually going to law school in 1972

Quote.Author: Frank Zappa
Quote.QuoteValue: I searched for years I found no love. I'm sure that love will never be a product of plasticity

Quote.Author: Frank Zappa
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics is the entertainment branch of industry

Quote.Author: Frank Zappa
Quote.QuoteValue: Communism doesn't work because people like to own stuff

Quote.Author: Frank Zappa
Quote.QuoteValue: There is more stupidity than hydrogen in the universe, and it has a longer shelf life

Quote.Author: Frank Zappa
Quote.QuoteValue: Without deviation progress is not possible

Quote.Author: Frank Zappa
Quote.QuoteValue: The United States is a nation of laws: badly written and randomly enforced

Quote.Author: Frank Zappa
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is always a commentary on society

Quote.Author: Frank Zappa
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to get laid, go to college. If you want an education, go to the library

Quote.Author: Frank Zappa
Quote.QuoteValue: I never set out to be weird. It was always other people who called me weird

Quote.Author: Frank Zappa
Quote.QuoteValue: All the good music has already been written by people with wigs and stuff

Quote.Author: Frankie Avalon
Quote.QuoteValue: When I started to play trumpet I was fortunate to learn very quickly

Quote.Author: Frankie Avalon
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, we all age, but I'd been taking herbal supplements for a long time

Quote.Author: Frankie Avalon
Quote.QuoteValue: It captures a lot of the spirit of the '50s

Quote.Author: Frankie Avalon
Quote.QuoteValue: No sooner than I did take it seriously, I had million-selling hits and movies with John Wayne

Quote.Author: Frankie Avalon
Quote.QuoteValue: I was not a trained actor

Quote.Author: Frankie Avalon
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been around two years shy of 50 years doing what I do. I am a musician

Quote.Author: Frankie Avalon
Quote.QuoteValue: I think today's music absolutely stinks. I really do mean that

Quote.Author: Frankie Avalon
Quote.QuoteValue: These kids today, everything is about hitting a vocal home run

Quote.Author: Frankie Avalon
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, but I don't think of the Teen Angel as of an age

Quote.Author: Frankie Avalon
Quote.QuoteValue: I like that because the fans want to see onstage what they know so well from the big screen

Quote.Author: Franklin P. Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Bravery is being the only one who knows you're afraid

Quote.Author: Franklin P. Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Love doesn't make the world go 'round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile

Quote.Author: Franklin P. Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: One advantage of talking to yourself is that you know at least somebody's listening

Quote.Author: Franklin P. Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Scratch a dog and you'll find a permanent job

Quote.Author: Franklin P. Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: All women should know how to take care of children. Most of them will have a husband some day

Quote.Author: Franklin P. Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: The trouble with being punctual is that nobody's there to appreciate it

Quote.Author: Franklin P. Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: An autobiography usually reveals nothing bad about its writer except his memory

Quote.Author: Franklin P. Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: You can learn many things from children. How much patience you have, for instance

Quote.Author: Franklin P. Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a strange world of language in which skating on thin ice can get you into hot water

Quote.Author: Franklin P. Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: You're an old-timer if you can remember when setting the world on fire was a figure of speech

Quote.Author: Frans de Waal
Quote.QuoteValue: Human morality is unthinkable without empathy

Quote.Author: Frans de Waal
Quote.QuoteValue: Very ancient parts of the brain are involved in moral decision making

Quote.Author: Frans de Waal
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is not inherently good

Quote.Author: Frans de Waal
Quote.QuoteValue: The more self-aware an animal is, the more empathetic it tends to be

Quote.Author: Frans de Waal
Quote.QuoteValue: The sturdiest pillars of human morality are compassion and a sense of justice

Quote.Author: Frans de Waal
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm personally a nonbeliever, so I'm struggling with if we really need religion

Quote.Author: Frans de Waal
Quote.QuoteValue: Humans have a lot of pro-social tendencies

Quote.Author: Frans de Waal
Quote.QuoteValue: The thinking is that we started evolving language not by speaking but by gesturing

Quote.Author: Frans de Waal
Quote.QuoteValue: War is evitable if conditions are such that the costs of making war are higher than the benefits

Quote.Author: Frans de Waal
Quote.QuoteValue: There are beautiful examples of art done by chimpanzees in human care

Quote.Author: Franz Liszt
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth is a great flirt

Quote.Author: Franz Liszt
Quote.QuoteValue: Sorrowful and great is the artist's destiny

Quote.Author: Franz Liszt
Quote.QuoteValue: Real men are sadly lacking in this world, for when they are put to the test they prove worthless

Quote.Author: Franz Liszt
Quote.QuoteValue: Mournful and yet grand is the destiny of the artist

Quote.Author: Franz Liszt
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is only a long and bitter suicide, and faith alone can transform this suicide into a sacrifice

Quote.Author: Franz Liszt
Quote.QuoteValue: It is impossible to imagine a more complete fusion with nature than that of the Gypsy

Quote.Author: Franz Liszt
Quote.QuoteValue: I foster a sorrowful conception of affection. Make no sacrifices

Quote.Author: Franz Liszt
Quote.QuoteValue: Beware of missing chances; otherwise it may be altogether too late some day

Quote.Author: Franz Liszt
Quote.QuoteValue: The public is always good
